mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu (menu_id, menu_date, menu_type, menu_pic, men1, men2, men3, menRice, menSoup, cal, prot, fat, carb, allergy_info) VALUES(#{menu_id}, #{menu_date}, #{menu_type}, #{menu_pic}, #{men1}, #{men2}, #{men3}, #{menRice}, #{menSoup}, #{cal}, #{prot}, #{carb}, #{fat}, #{allergy_info})
